root.message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 9-4-1, translated into en
root.data:
Statistical indicators help state management agencies understand the amount of money that the state spends on science and technology from which to adjust policies to meet the development requirements of the country.

Is an indicator reflecting how much each economic type has contributed in the field of science and technology. On that basis, the State promptly sets forth policies to encourage economic sectors to participate in science and technology development.

is an important indicator to calculate a number of aggregate economic indicators in the national account by industry and economic sector.
